sections.heading: or devise; approval by city council or village board of trustees
sections.text: Before any gift or devise specified in section 17-961 may be accepted, such gift or devise shall be approved by the city council or village board of trustees.SourceLaws 1945, c. 31, § 2, p. 149;Laws 1992, LB 1240, § 15;Laws 2017, LB133

17-962.Gift or devise; approval by city council or village board of trustees.

Before any gift or devise specified in section 17-961 may be accepted, such gift or devise shall be approved by the city council or village board of trustees.

SourceLaws 1945, c. 31, § 2, p. 149;Laws 1992, LB 1240, § 15;Laws 2017, LB133, § 293.
